name: part_002
file: tmp_大神ミオ２周年記念３Dライブ【2nd anniversary】 [mmUVwNut2-Y]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Ookami Mio performing the song 'Don't say "lazy"' on stage during her 2nd-anniversary 3D live.
Ookami Mio in a traditional Japanese room, celebrating her 2nd anniversary with a whole cake.
Ookami Mio performing the song 'Shin-ai' (深愛) on a snowy stage.

subtitles.original: Don't say lazy
subtitles.english: Don't say lazy

subtitles.original: うちもめっちゃ楽しんでるよー！
subtitles.english: I'm having a blast too!

subtitles.original: やばっ　まさか　留年ぽい
subtitles.english: Oh no, don't tell me, I might fail this grade

subtitles.original: いや　ギリクリア
subtitles.english: No, barely passed

subtitles.original: それだけで　めでたし　満足感
subtitles.english: Just with that, I'm happy and satisfied

subtitles.original: 大事なのは自分　可愛がること
subtitles.english: What's important is taking care of yourself

subtitles.original: 自分を許さなきゃ　他人も許せない
subtitles.english: If you don't forgive yourself, you can't forgive others

subtitles.original: Please don't say "You are lazy"
subtitles.english: Please don't say "You are lazy"

subtitles.original: だって本当は crazy
subtitles.english: Because actually, I'm crazy

subtitles.original: 白鳥たちはそう　見えないとこでバタ足するんです
subtitles.english: Like swans, we're paddling frantically beneath the surface

subtitles.original: 本能に従順　忠実
subtitles.english: Compliant and faithful to instinct

subtitles.original: 翻弄も重々承知
subtitles.english: Well aware of being trifled with

subtitles.original: 前途洋々だし　だからたまに休憩しちゃうんです
subtitles.english: The future is bright, so I take a break now and then

subtitles.original: ありがとうー！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: わー！2周年お祝いのケーキだ！嬉しい！
subtitles.english: Wow! It's a 2nd anniversary celebration cake! I'm so happy!

subtitles.original: いただきまーす！
subtitles.english: Let's eat!

subtitles.original: んー！甘くて美味しい！
subtitles.english: Mmm! It's sweet and delicious!

subtitles.original: もういっちょ！
subtitles.english: Another bite!

subtitles.original: んー！最高だね！
subtitles.english: Mmm! This is the best!

subtitles.original: 美味しい、美味しい！
subtitles.english: Delicious, delicious!

subtitles.original: いや、これは、これはこれは、もう、これクリーミーですね！
subtitles.english: Wow, this is... this is really... man, it's so creamy!

subtitles.original: みんなも食べたいでしょ？
subtitles.english: You guys want some too, right?

subtitles.original: あーん...あげないけどね！
subtitles.english: Say 'ahhh'... but I'm not giving you any!

subtitles.original: あ！ラスト行こうか！もう一個！
subtitles.english: Ah! Let's go for the last one! One more!

subtitles.original: んー！完食！
subtitles.english: Mmm! All finished!

subtitles.original: おかゆー！
subtitles.english: Okayu!

subtitles.original: 深愛 / 作詞：水樹奈々 / 作曲：上松範康
subtitles.english: Shin-ai / Lyrics: Nana Mizuki / Comp: Noriyasu Agematsu

subtitles.original: 雪が舞い散る夜空
subtitles.english: The night sky where snow dances down

subtitles.original: 二人寄り添い見上げた
subtitles.english: Two of us snuggled up and looked up

subtitles.original: 繋がる手と手の温もりは
subtitles.english: The warmth of our joined hands

subtitles.original: とても優しかった
subtitles.english: Was very gentle

subtitles.original: 淡いオールドブルーの
subtitles.english: In the pale old blue

subtitles.original: 雲間に消えてゆくでしょう
subtitles.english: It will likely vanish between the clouds

subtitles.original: 永遠へと続くはずの
subtitles.english: What should have lasted for eternity

subtitles.original: あの約束
subtitles.english: That promise

subtitles.original: あなたの側にいるだけで
subtitles.english: Just by being by your side

subtitles.original: ただそれだけでよかった
subtitles.english: That alone was enough

subtitles.original: いつのまにか膨らむ
subtitles.english: Before I knew it, it swelled

subtitles.original: 今以上の夢に気づかずに
subtitles.english: Without realizing it had become a bigger dream than now

subtitles.original: どんな時も　どこにいる時でも
subtitles.english: No matter when, no matter where I am

subtitles.original: 強く　強く　抱きしめていて
subtitles.english: Hold me tight, hold me tight

subtitles.original: 情熱が日常に染まるとしても
subtitles.english: Even if passion becomes mundane

subtitles.original: あなたへのこの想いすべて
subtitles.english: All of these feelings for you

subtitles.original: 終わりなき愛信じている
subtitles.english: I believe in this endless love

subtitles.original: あなただけをずっと見つめているの
subtitles.english: I will keep watching only you forever

subtitles.original: 交わす言葉と時間
subtitles.english: The words and time we exchange

subtitles.original: 姿を変えてゆくでしょう
subtitles.english: They will likely change their form

subtitles.original: 白い頬に乗せたそれは
subtitles.english: The thing placed on your white cheek

subtitles.original: 月の涙
subtitles.english: Is a tear of the moon

subtitles.original: 行かないでともう少しだけ
subtitles.english: Saying 'Don't go,' just a little longer

subtitles.original: 何度も言いかけては
subtitles.english: I started to say it many times

subtitles.original: また会えるよね　きっと
subtitles.english: We can meet again, surely
